author: jleroux
msg: I committed Sascha's patch in trunk at r1003836, but I finally reverted it as I'm not sure the EcommerceUiLabels will be there in all cases. And I guess if it's there, there should be a reason... I must say I did not take the time to dig it further... Also looks like Sascha's use case is specific (no English Labels) and OFBiz OOTB is not specific.
